EmailTemplate.name: IPM_BET_ET_LinkDenied
EmailTemplate.subject: IPM Project Link to BET Denied.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your request to link {!IPM_Project__c.Name} to {!IPM_Project__c.BET_Denied_BET_Link__c} has been denied by the BET Owner. Please change your selection in core parameters via the ' Change BET selection' on your IPM Project Overview.
